title: Scientific Publish Awards
scientific1: Publishing scientific research is one of the most important tasks that faculty members and researchers at Kafrelsheikh University are supposed to undertake.
scientific2: Therefore, the research awards program was established in order to praise the efforts made by distinguished researchers at Kafrelsheikh University and motivate them to do more in order to advance the field of academic research, conduct more research, and raise the academic level of the university so that it is in the ranks of international universities.
instructionline: Applicants for the International Publishing Awards must submit:
instruction1: An image from the Google Scholar page from the applicant’s website scholar.google.com
instruction2: The academic affiliation must contain the name of Kafrelsheikh University as follows: “Kafrelsheikh University.”
instruction3: The email must be (Verified Email) containing the Kafrelsheikh University domain on the Internet, which is “kfs.edu.eg.”
homepageline2: Statistics show the size of the awards at Kafrelsheikh University
name: Name
date of publication of the research: Date of publication of the research
where to conduct the search in Arabic: Where to conduct the search in Arabic
the impact factor of a publishing journa: The impact factor of a publishing journal
the standard serial number of the journa: The standard serial number of the journal
the quadrant in which the journal is loc: The quadrant in which the journal is located (Q) for papers published on SCOUPS
are there faculty members at Kafrelsheik: Are there faculty members at Kafrelsheikh University participating in the research?
choose the number of research participan: Choose the number of research participants
the scientific name written on the searc: The scientific name written on the search in Arabic
the submitted research must be in PDF fo: - The submitted research must be in PDF format.
research under publication or accepted f: - Research under publication or accepted for publication will not be accepted.
It is not permissible to submit research: - It is not permissible to submit research to obtain another university award.
research papers not listed with the name: - Research papers not listed with the name of Kafr El-Sheikh University will be excluded.
all submitted research must have been pu: - All submitted research must have been published within three calendar years from the date of the end of the application.
in the event that the journal’s impact f: - In the event that the journal’s impact factor is discontinued, the research published in it will be approved, provided that it is published in the same year of discontinuation and not after it.
research published in a scientific journ: - Research published in a scientific journal with a Q1 scale is accepted on the Scopus database.
articles and scientific papers published: - Articles and scientific papers published under the following titles will not be accepted:
or any new names that do not meet the co: Or any new names that do not meet the conditions and rules of scientific research
